name: places/ChIJLfGMb8BYwokRuRgJ274zXas
adrFormatAddress: 1429 2nd Ave, New York, NY 10021, USA

originalText.text: They kicked my girlfriend out of the lobby while she was politely sitting on the couch waiting for me to use the bathroom in Equinox, after we had just finished her medical scan around the corner. They forced her onto the street in thirty degree weather. I doubt they would have confronted a homeless person, so why would they go after the girlfriend of a member? Could it have been her race? I expect better treatment in exchange for paying several hundred dollars a month for an all access membership. The front desk staff on duty 12/16/23 between 11am-12pm was remorseless and unapologetic. I will be filing a complaint with the corporate office.

originalText.text:
The place used to be good and well maintained but recently in the past months no one cares...the steam room has the door broken now for almost 7 months and no one fixes it...the boiler in the shower is not working so u can be having a nice warm shower but suddenly it becomes super cold...Not to mention other minor details (shampoo bottles not filled, cotton swabs not available for a week now...)
Place need to  be better managed.

originalText.text:
Nothing too unusual about this location other than the fact that it's spread out across 5 (?) floors. Standard array of machines, clean like the others, no issues with staff, etc. (Steam room is one of my favs, I think it looks cool lol)

That said, it's not very well maintained when it comes to the actual equipment. Handles are falling apart, I thought there was brown vomit on the stretching mats but it turns out it's just worn away, sloppy paint touchups... Don't normally see things like this at Equinox.

originalText.text: WOW Management at this facility has gone down hill. They screwed up my husband's medical freeze, continued to charge his credit card and refusing to provide reimbursement. Instead they are issuing account credits even thou the medical freeze screwed up was their mistake. They kept charging his credit card even thou the account had a previous monthly credit (we just found one about this new credit on account). This doe not sound right or ethical. I have escalated the request to Senior Director, since the new manager of this facility was unprofessional (Kept waiting 24 days for a reimbursement update and she never replied back to the emails, when I tried to call her she was in "meetings" Very disappointed the level of service Equinox is providing specially when there is a serious medical injury at place , ZERO compassion or accountability for their billing mistakes.

originalText.text:
This is the gym you've been looking to join. Want to get in shape? Join this gym. Want your partner to love you again? Join this gym. Haven't heard from one of your parents in over 10 years? Join this gym.

Between the instructors who can drive you to your goals and cleanliness of this place, I get depressed when I leave. Every tile and weight is so delicately displayed, it produces a cornucopia of aesthetics. A ballad to man's pursuit of perfection. A  staccato of success that pierces into your soul, lifting you beyond the clouds, and into the arms of Icarus.

Maybe the rest of my life will be defined by the simple question - when can I go back to 74th street?

Also, has lots of towels.
